testsuite.name: shoppingBasket

testcase.name: Given the user is logged in
the user searches for the Ludwig II pen... again
and selects the desired product to see all the info
on the product's info page, the user sees different sections
the user selects two Ludwig II pens because he's fucking rich
and adds them to his shopping basket
